model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    The Player class. Contains all of the player's units (although not their locations on the field), their stats, if they're alive or dead.

        public boolean everyonesDeadDave()

        Returns:
